item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: Team at @conduitxyz is top notch. Excited to be working with them to accelerate the eventuality that is ZK.
Along other great ZK teams we will see the rapid adoption of ZK allowing rollups to unlock new features and a better user experience.

item.title:
R to @KAndrewHuang: At that point, Ethereum + Eth2 can match any alt-L1 on performance and usability. That allows Ethereum to double down on its natural advantages:
Credible neutrality The most devs Existing institutional interest
In short, ZK is insanely bullish for Ethereum.
item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang
item.description:
At that point, Ethereum + Eth2 can match any alt-L1 on performance and usability. That allows Ethereum to double down on its natural advantages:

Credible neutrality
The most devs
Existing institutional interest

In short, ZK is insanely bullish for Ethereum.

item.title: R to @KAndrewHuang: Just today, @Arbitrum announced a promising initiative on this front with its universal intents engine. Many other teams are also making strides here.

item.title:
R to @KAndrewHuang: ZK is easier than ever to implement thanks to teams like @SuccinctLabs and @RISCZero.
As ZK adoption grows and interoperability improves, we can also focus on the UX ‚Äì putting bridging under the hood so using Ethereum + rollups feels like using one big chain.
item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang
item.description:
ZK is easier than ever to implement thanks to teams like @SuccinctLabs and @RISCZero.

As ZK adoption grows and interoperability improves, we can also focus on the UX ‚Äì putting bridging under the hood so using Ethereum + rollups feels like using one big chain.

item.title:
R to @KAndrewHuang: ZK solves this.
ZK reduces withdrawal times from 7 days to 1 hour. Users can move funds between rollups more easily, and fast bridges can become 168x more capital efficient ‚Äì fronting 1 hour worth of liquidity vs 7 days ‚Äì and therefore cheaper.
item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang
item.description:
ZK solves this.

ZK reduces withdrawal times from 7 days to 1 hour. Users can move funds between rollups more easily, and fast bridges can become 168x more capital efficient ‚Äì fronting 1 hour worth of liquidity vs 7 days ‚Äì and therefore cheaper.

item.title:
R to @KAndrewHuang: The rollup-centric roadmap is working. Rollups are scaling Ethereum performance 50-100x at any given time.
The problem is that using Ethereum doesn‚Äôt yet feel like using one big chain. It feels like using‚Ä¶a network of rollups. Constant bridging is a pain for users.
item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang
item.description:
The rollup-centric roadmap is working. Rollups are scaling Ethereum performance 50-100x at any given time.

The problem is that using Ethereum doesn‚Äôt yet feel like using one big chain. It feels like using‚Ä¶a network of rollups. Constant bridging is a pain for users.

item.title:
There‚Äôs lots of handwringing about Ethereum losing users to more centralized, high-performance chains like Solana.
The answer? It‚Äôs not a better foundation or wartime Milady pfps (those are cool tho). It‚Äôs interoperability, powered by ZK.
item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: G7 Network from @G7_DAO is live on mainnet today.
G7 is the @Arbitrum L3 where devs get top-tier onchain gaming infrastructure.
G7 is launching with the full Arbitrum stack, with @circle‚Äôs Bridged USDC Standard integration from Conduit Marketplace.

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: Doubling down on both Ethereum deltas (via options ofc - dont want to get scamwicked), and the Ethereum ecosystem.
Every big market flush causes the narrative rotators to up and leave. Creates more space for the remaining teams to collaborate and strengthen ties to ride out the slower periods.
We've been fortunate to work with the best teams in the Ethereum ecosystem for multiple years now - and will continue to align closely with those whose aim is to build a faster, more efficient, and new financial system. High conviction that Ethereum remains the best place to do so.
Did this last bear and that led to a 10x in results, time to do it again.
item.dc:creator: @itseneff
item.description:
Doubling down on both Ethereum deltas (via options ofc - dont want to get scamwicked), and the Ethereum ecosystem.

Every big market flush causes the narrative rotators
to up and leave. Creates more space for the remaining teams to collaborate and strengthen ties to ride out the slower periods.

We've been fortunate to work with the best teams in the Ethereum ecosystem for multiple years now - and will continue to align closely with those whose aim is to build a faster, more efficient, and new financial system. High conviction that Ethereum remains the best place to do so.

Did this last bear and that led to a 10x in results, time to do it again.
